title: URGENT HELP!!
content:
PES RR ECE VS BMS ECE
Im confused between the two ,which is better?

comments.body: Bms ece
Any specific reason why?
I would say eat biriyani and chill
Man wow
Okay so actually answering the question it depends pes ece will be stressful if you wanna enjoy life have do good stuff take bmsce, pes is stressful, and ece is real difficult at pes
pes ece
I am just guessing but are you from euro hsr school?
Are you talking about BMSCE or BMSIT?
BMSCE
What about placements?
Why?
I will be frank placements are shit, you can see it from the photos of placements on the group already I said go for bms because atleast you can enjoy life
Hmm okay , thanks so much
Both are good colleges. But I think PES ECE is better when it comes to placements
Dm?
Ece placements are bad in pes
Go for BMS ece if you care about placements and college life.
Asking advises on Reddit would be the dangerous thing while taking decision

brother ece is trash everywhere...pes just sucks your soul out a little more than the others
it's not gonna be smooth sailing in any of those colleges
other colleges will shoot you in the leg while pes will shoot you right in the face

Ece is toughest and hectic in pes , everyone thrashes it lol. If you want college life choose bmsce . Placements are comparable everytime, yaha waha koi accha package le lega toh avg increases , median is similar
